This realm is amazing. These creatures grow straight from the crystals themselves. I could spend my lifetime studying this and still not understand how rock and gem create lifeforms. Simply, truly, amazing.

I came across a structure, similar to a house and inside it a curious device which changes the molecular structure of the crystals found in the earth, just as the extaction master said. I must understand how it does this. Imagine turning copper to gold, or quartz to diamonds! The uses are unfathomable.

I've resolved myself that I may not return to Overworld, but I have not given up complete hope. So as not to lose it, I've hidden my datacom. This one act has lifted a burden so great and I can now focus on my studies of these curious crystals.
